courses.title: Certified Digital Marketing Specialist
courses.description: Digital marketing refers to the use of digital tools and technologies to promote and market products, services, organizations, and brands. Digital marketing offers several attractive features. allows businesses to target specific audiences based on demographics, interests, behaviors, and more. The demand for digital marketing services on freelancing marketplaces and local marketplaces is significant. Ready to kickstart your career in digital marketing? Join our comprehensive digital marketing program and gain the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the digital marketing industry.

careerOpportunities.title: These days, the majority of businesses rely on their digital marketing division to increase product sales. In actuality, the demand for digital marketers is growing on a global scale to keep up with consumer demand. Enrolling in our institute's professional digital marketing training program will help you stand out in this cutthroat industry.

Numerous international marketplaces, such as Fiverr, Upwork, and People Per Hour, frequently post marketing jobs on their websites. If you can acquire the necessary abilities to draw in clients, you can work for yourself as a freelancer and make a steady income.

courses.title: Certificated  Graphics Designer
courses.description: In light of the increasing need for visual information, marketers are now using graphical concepts to promote their products. The growing need for graphic designers has opened up a lot of options for independent workers. According to a survey, all businesses place a high value on visual recognition; even tiny businesses will pay up to $500 for the ideal logo. This revised Graphic Design course is ideal for those who have a strong enthusiasm for creating graphics.

careerOpportunities.title: Through the creation of eye-catching posters and logos, graphic designers play a critical role in the promotion of businesses. Recently, there has been an increase in demand for expert graphic designers due to the expanding number of companies across the globe. Following the completion of the advanced graphic design course, you will be able to find remote work within or outside of our nation. You can get assistance in this area from our career placement department.

According to research, roughly 57% of workers in the creative and design sectors are independent contractors. The number is rising over time as more people choose to pursue lucrative independent careers. Numerous graphic design assignments are available on international marketplaces such as Fiverr, Upwork, and People Per Hour. As a talented designer, you can also begin a freelance profession.

courses.title: Certified UX/UI Designer
courses.description: One of the most in-demand positions in the digital industry today is UX design. Employing qualified designers is becoming more and more important to businesses since it ensures user-friendly websites. According to a survey, complicated interface design is the reason over 77% of online businesses fail to thrive in the cutthroat global market. UX designers guarantee the website's effectiveness and make it simple for users to navigate. This course is for you if working with graphical elements is something you enjoy.
courseOutline: Understanding the Most Popular Website Functionalities
Process of Calculating the Total Unique WebPages of Various Websites
Process of Calculating the Feature of App
Establish balance among the users, stakeholders and market demands

careerOpportunities.title: UX designers work on many projects; from problem identification to solution discovery, and they greatly influence a website's overall aesthetic. Because of this, most businesses are looking for qualified designers to make user-friendly websites.

The course begins with an introduction to drawing, where you will learn how to use flowcharts to build websites or apps. Additionally, you will learn how to use Figma and AdobeXD tools. After finishing all the assignments, you can create a portfolio that highlights your practical abilities to stand out in the employment market.
